name: test_e2e_with_logs[025_SQLI_ERROR_007]
description:
## Attack Pattern Information

| Item | Value |
|------|-------|
| **Pattern ID** | `SQLI_ERROR_007` |
| **Name** | Information schema table access |
| **Category** | SQLI |
| **Subcategory** | error_based |
| **Severity** | `HIGH` |

## Attack Details

- **Payload**: `' AND (SELECT * FROM information_schema.tables LIMIT 1) --`
- **Encoded**: `%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20LIMIT%201%29%20--`
- **Expected Detection**: Yes

## Test Execution Results

- **Status**: `PASSED`
- **Detection Count**: 1 / 1
- **Latency**: ~26000ms
- **Timestamp**: 04:53:37.000 UTC

## Detection Evidence

**Rule Name**: [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_007-1767070417428-s2itr pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_007 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20LIMIT%201%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET

**Falco Log Entry**:
```
04:53:37.000000000: Critical [NGINX SQLi] Boolean-based Blind SQL Injection test_id=SQLI_ERROR_007-1767070417428-s2itr pattern_id=SQLI_ERROR_007 uri=/?q=%27%20AND%20%28SELECT%20%2A%20FROM%20information_schema.tables%20LIMIT%201%29%20-- client=127.0.0.1 method=GET
```
